select bti.id, bti.book_id, bti.name, bti.index_no, bti.views, bti.words, bti.check_flag, bti.create_date, bti.content, bi.code, bi.name as bookName, bi.images, bi.`type`, bi.content as bookContent, ai.name as authorName, ai.images as authorImages from book_detail_info bti left join book_info bi on (bi.id = bti.book_id) left join author_info ai on (ai.id = bi.author_id) where 1 = 1
AND bti.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookDetailInfo.name},'%')
AND bi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookDetailInfo.bookName},'%')
AND ai.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bookDetailInfo.authorName},'%')
AND ai.user_id = #{bookDetailInfo.userId}
order by bti.create_date desc
